confirmed_facts: 31 people died from floods and landslides
Thousands of residents moved to temporary shelters
16 residents were trapped in a landslide in Badulla
River levels rose across Sri Lanka
Heavy rainfall is forecasted to continue
High school graduation exams were suspended

timeline.event: Previous heavy rains caused 26 deaths in Sri Lanka
Floods and landslides caused 17 deaths in Sri Lanka
Heavy rains triggered floods and landslides, killing 31 people and leaving 14 missing
400 houses were damaged by the floods
High school graduation exams were suspended due to the disaster
